requiredFlags.name: --name
requiredFlags.description: Name of the generated Lightning App. The name can be up to 40 characters and must start with a letter.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --template
optionalFlags.description: Template to use for file creation. Supplied parameter values or default values are filled into a copy of the template.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory for saving the created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command

commands.name: lightning generate component
commands.description: Generate a bundle for an Aura component or a Lightning web component.

requiredFlags.name: --name
requiredFlags.description: Name of the generated Lightning Component. The name can be up to 40 characters and must start with a letter.

optionalFlags.name: --json
optionalFlags.description: Format output as json.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --template
optionalFlags.description: Template to use for file creation. Supplied parameter values or default values are filled into a copy of the template.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory for saving the created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command

optionalFlags.name: --type
optionalFlags.description: Type of the component bundle. To generate a Lightning web component, pass "--type lwc" to the command. If you don't specify --type, Salesforce CLI generates an Aura component by default.
